recipe.title: GoT Cocktails: The Debt Payer With Cinnamon And Bubbles

steps.step: Place gold sprinkles in a small bowl. Run the lemon wedge around the rim of a champagne flute. Dip the rim in the sprinkles.
Add the Goldschlager to the flute and top with the champagne. Gently stir in the edible glitter.
